description: Summary metrics about containers running on Kubernetes nodes. Resources do not include those of tainted nodes

targets.expr: label_join(max(container_memory_max_usage_bytes{instance=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", name!="", container!=""}) by (namespace, name, container),  "join_label", "_", "name", "namespace", "container")

label_join(max(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{instance=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", name!="", container!=""}) by (namespace, name, container),  "join_label", "_", "name", "namespace", "container")

label_join(max(container_memory_working_set_bytes{instance=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", name!="", container!=""}) by (namespace, name, container),  "join_label", "_", "name", "namespace", "container")

title: Kubernetes Cluster
